description: This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP}. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP} {ACTION_attack} or {ACTION_cast} their top-most spell at the start of their turns. Your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP} have a 50% chance to afflict the target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SLEEP} with attacks and spells. This trait does not stack.
name: Sleepwalking
